name: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Saint John

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here with my husband and had a great stay. Enjoyed the cleanliness of the room, love the white linen, beds were comfortable, bathrooms clean and lots of hot water!!
reviews.title: Great amenities .. wouldn't think of staying anywhere else!

reviews.text: Breakfast in the morning was great, lots of variety and given that this is included in the room price, highly recommend having breakfast there. Breakfast is in an open airy space and staff is great at keeping the area clean.
reviews.title: AMAZING LOCATION AND HOTEL OVERALL

reviews.text: Pool was nice and fun to have a waterslide there too. Hot tub was nice and warm and relaxing.
reviews.title: Pool is GROSS!!!!!!!

reviews.text: Staff is awesome, very helpful and go out of their way to make your stay wonderful. Discounts arranged with the local restaurants are great and it shows they are really trying to work with their area businesses to pull together as a team.
reviews.title: Great hotel , though in a mall district

reviews.text: Highly recommend the hotel..tell your friends and family to stay there..they won't regret it!
reviews.title: 3RD choice in Saint John

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was disappointed in this Hampton Inn, the elevators were not working properly on our 5 day stay, the location is good near shopping, the room doors bang all the time and there are easy fixes for that. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. I feel the cleaning was lax and mildew on the shower walls is not good for a 3 year old hotel. The breakfast and staff were great. However the toasters suck, and the one in Moncton put in a moving rack type much better. The AC in the room was very noisy and when I tried to get it fixed, I was told that just keep it above 72 and it would be quite.... that was not on at that point. I was offered another room on a floor with a wedding going on, nope, plus it was noisy too. I have stayed in dozens of Hampton Inns and this was lower on my list than most. The one in Moncton NB was fantastic, the attention to details made it shine. A door opening holder, breakfast mints, a letter welcoming us to the Moncton Hampton Inn. The Saint John Inn needs some work with overall cleaning and landscaping etc. But the staff #1.
reviews.title: Not the best Hampton Inn

reviews.text: I stay at this property on a regular basis and although I usually only review hotels that I stay at on vacation, I felt I should give this place a shoutout. This hotel is very nice with modern rooms and very nice beds and linens. The breakfast is very good with a few hot items. Free internet (which is always consistently good) and free parking. Hilton Honors members get treated like gold, especially if you actually are "gold" or "diamond" level members. I am diamond and always get an upgrade if available without ever having to ask. The Junior King Suites are really worth the extra $$. Pam at the front desk is the best ever! She will go the extra mile to make sure you are comfortable and have everything you need. I hope the management realizes what a gem they have with her. I have dealt with her at two different properties over the last decade and she is consistently awesome! You won't be dissappointed with this property. It is located very close to the best shopping and several restaurants. The property does not have PPV movies or a bar. This is unacceptable really nowadays in this calibre of hotel and the ownership really should get with the program and realize that they need to provide their clientele with what they want. I have addressed this with the staff already to no avail. They are leaving a lot of dollars on the table. Stay and enjoy. It's a really nice place.
reviews.title: Best business hotel and nicest rooms in the city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great place to stay. Even before we got there, Shelley at reception was so nice on the phone trying to explain how to get there ( We got lost twice, late at night ) It is new, very clean and well, just great. The staff was all very friendly, the breakfast was good. The beds, bedding and little extras was great. It is built on a hill overlookin a huge shopping district with every imaginable store and restaurant around. I would stay there again in a heartbeat for we only paid $125 a night.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn is great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 2 nights here before heading to Prince Edwards Island. The staff was very helpful and the room was very comfortable. It was a nice size room so we didn't feel cramped. The staff at the front desk gave us a coupon for a discount at a local restaurant. Breakfast both mornings was well staffed and plentiful. We enjoyed the hot tub after having endured a long drive. Also took advantage of the fitness room both mornings.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for one night on our trip through the Maritimes. We had a little bit of trouble finding it but didn't go too far out of our way..its not on the Garmin GPS yet.
reviews.title: Great hotel..make sure you stay here!

reviews.text: Saint John is just a stopover place for our family on the way to PEI, but it would be difficult to find anything wrong with this place. The hotel is fairly new and is located adjacent to the biggest shopping center in East Saint John. Pool area is clean and the water slide is very fast! Breakfast is typical Hampton (nothing you would want to pay extra for, but it's included in the price). Staff was friendly and courteous. Free parking/free wi-fi.
reviews.title: Kids love it

reviews.text: If there is any downside, it might be location. The flagship Hilton is located on the waterfront and cost just $10 more per night for the ability to walk throughout downtown. If you are a "first timer" to Saint John, staying downtown makes more sense.
reviews.title: An Excellent place to stay in Saint John

reviews.text: Otherwise, this is a perfect stopover.
reviews.title: Great place to stay with freindly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel many times over the last couple of years, and I have nothing negative to say about the hotel
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, excellent price!

reviews.text: The rooms are clean & spacious, staff always friendly, great breakfast, free parking. It is close to shopping.
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Saint John

reviews.text: Stayed with three friends - went to see Daniel O'Donnell. Hotel room wan perfect, staff the excellent. Came back from concert and sat in lounge with coffee and cookies, late at night. Breakfast was excellent, sure would recommend it to every one. Thank you Hampton Inn.
reviews.title: ENJOYABLE

reviews.text: Mary McGonnell
reviews.title: Very, very nice hotel and amazing staff!

reviews.text: Ch'town, PEI
reviews.title: Great hotel with GREAT staff!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are planning a shopping trip to Saint John or going for business, this is the place to stay! The rooms are very new and modern as the hotel is only a few years old. The beds and linens are very comfortable. The small price increase to go up to a 'Junior Suite' is worth every penny. You will not regret it! The room is much bigger and is a TRUE upgrade! The staff there are excellent, especially Pam at the front desk. They should promote her to a management position. she certainly deserves it. She's such a gem and such a hard worker... always looking to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.
reviews.title: Absolutely satisfied with accomodations, staff & ammenities!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Can't recommend this hotel enough!
reviews.title: Great hotel..very relaxing!

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites By Hilton Saint John Hotel
